content:
Certainly, here are some indoor activity suggestions in Fremantle that your family can enjoy:

1. Fremantle Leisure Centre: A large indoor venue with heated pools, water slides, a gymnasium, and indoor sports courts, perfect for a fun-filled family day.

2. Fremantle Arts Centre Kids' Studio Workshop: A series of fun creative workshops designed for children to learn how to make art and craft or theater basics, held on weekends or school holidays.

3. Fremantle Library: A spacious library with a children's section that provides plenty of books, games, and activities like storytime sessions and other seasonal activities.

4. Fremantle Prison Art Tour: An indoor guided art and history tour of Fremantle's historic prison. This tour is perfect if you like to learn new things together.

5. Rollerdrome: An indoor roller skating rink, suitable for kids and adults for the whole family to have fun.

6. Planetarium: A virtual tour of the galaxy that will delight young children and older space enthusiasts alike.

7. The Pickled Fairy and Other Myths: A magical shop offering an immersive experience for children to explore fairy tales and fantasy, with costumes, books, toys, and interactive displays.

These indoor activities offer a great opportunity to spend quality time with your family while enjoying new experiences, no matter the weather outside.
